description: Try our easy to follow Orange Buckwheat Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Orange Buckwheat Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place eggs, milk, maple syrup and orange zest in a mixing bowl and whisk to combine.
Add flour and baking powder and mix gently to combine.

Heat a nonstick frying pan over medium heat and spray with olive oil. Pour 1/4 cup batter into the pan per pancake and cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles start appearing on the surface. Flip and cook for a further minute or until cooked through. Repeat with remaining batter.
Serve with berries, yoghurt and honey.
